cryptocurrency.summary:
Here's a summary of the provided cryptocurrency news articles:

A Florida man lost his $354 million Bitcoin fortune after lying to federal agents, while Dogecoin experienced a 5% price drop due to a bearish outlook. Institutionally, Anchorage Digital is providing regulated access to Bitcoin-native DeFi, and the Tenerife Council plans to sell Bitcoin bought in 2012 to fund research projects. Finally, Michael Saylor predicts Bitcoin will reach $150,000 by the end of the year.

health-technology.summary: AI is being deployed in healthcare to address critical challenges like diagnosing tuberculosis in underserved areas and transforming medical research, review, and treatment to improve interventions and make care more affordable. Simultaneously, concerns are growing about the impact of AI on vulnerable populations, particularly children, leading to proposed legislation like the GUARD Act to protect minors from AI chatbots. A human-centric approach is needed to address AI's blind spots in health, especially when applying it to generative AI.
